text: Hi, is there any interface for calling pcap library and sniffing in Julia?

elements.text: Hi, is there any interface for calling pcap library and sniffing in Julia?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
you could create a wrapper package using BinaryBuilder though

elements.text: you could create a wrapper package using BinaryBuilder though

text: you can also call directly into libpcap with the ccall interface, if you have the libary installed already

elements.text: you can also call directly into libpcap with the ccall interface, if you have the libary installed already
